title: Direct x error
body:
Hey, so when I have my graphics card enabled, the game wont start I get the direct x error, when I have it disabled, the game starts, but I have like 7 fps running off cpu. I've tried repair tool, my drivers are up to date, tried deleting game.cfg, tried disabling and re enabling, I've tried enabling while in game after having it disabled and i just get a black screen but sound works.

I have a geforce gtx 780, if you could help would be deeply appreciated, thanks

replies.body: I've tried uninstalling and re installing and yeah i've tried re installing my graphics card drivers, also contacted support but my email linked to this acc I don't know so i'll give support another ticket, thanks, it's weird that it works while my gpu is disabled, running off cpu but doesn't work with it enabled

It certainly makes me think it's a conflict between your card and the game rather than something with your install. Whether or not it's a problem wholly on your card's side or some combination of factors I don't know. Hopefully support can point you in the right direction at least.

Have you tried running a clean reinstall with the Hextech Repair Tool?

If you are getting DirectX errors sometimes only a full reinstall will correct them. If that doesn't work either I'd recommend making sure your DirectX is up to date: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=35

I'd also recommend reinstalling your graphics card drivers, since it could have been a bad update or conflict causing the issues as well.

If all else fails, contact support and they should be able to help you further: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Some things to note when contacting support, keep it short, simple and to the point. Tell them the issue and what you have already tried to fix it.
